New Records: Devon Conway became the 11th player to score 90 or more in a T20 World Cup match
Key Match Events: New Zealand scored 200-3, their highest T20 World Cup total
Australia were skittled for 111, their lowest T20 World Cup total
Pre-Game Insights: The match was a repeat of the 2021 T20 World Cup final
Post-Match Reflections: This was New Zealand's first win against Australia in Australia in any format since 2011
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at a sold-out Sydney Cricket Ground
Others: The win avenged New Zealand's defeat in last year's T20 World Cup final
